Docs.summary: Encapsulates the format of tracks played in TvInputService.

remarks.para: Encapsulates the format of tracks played in TvInputService.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

remarks.para: Returns the audio channel count. Valid only for #TYPE_AUDIO tracks.

Docs.summary: Returns a user readable description for the current track.

remarks.para: Returns a user readable description for the current track.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Encoding As String
public: property System::String ^ Encoding { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the codec in the form of mime type.

remarks.para: Returns the codec in the form of mime type. If the encoding is unknown or could not be determined, the corresponding value will be null.

For example of broadcast, codec information may be referred to broadcast standard (e.g. Component Descriptor of ETSI EN 300 468). In the case that track type is subtitle, mime type could be defined in broadcast standard (e.g. "text/dvb.subtitle" or "text/dvb.teletext" in ETSI TS 102 812 V1.3.1 section 7.6).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Extra As Bundle
public: property Android::OS::Bundle ^ Extra { Android::OS::Bundle ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the extra information about the current track.

remarks.para: Returns the extra information about the current track.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the ID of the track.

remarks.para: Returns the ID of the track.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAudioDescription As Boolean
public: property bool IsAudioDescription { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns true if the track is an audio description intended for people with visual impairment, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Returns true if the track is an audio description intended for people with visual impairment, false otherwise. Valid only for #TYPE_AUDIO tracks.

For example of broadcast, audio description information may be referred to broadcast standard (e.g. ISO 639 Language Descriptor of ISO/IEC 13818-1, Supplementary Audio Language Descriptor, AC-3 Descriptor, Enhanced AC-3 Descriptor, AAC Descriptor of ETSI EN 300 468).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEncrypted As Boolean
public: property bool IsEncrypted { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns true if the track is encrypted, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Returns true if the track is encrypted, false otherwise. If the encryption status is unknown or could not be determined, the corresponding value will be false.
For example: ISO/IEC 13818-1 defines a CA descriptor that can be used to determine the encryption status of some broadcast streams.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsHardOfHearing As Boolean
public: property bool IsHardOfHearing { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns true if the track is intended for people with hearing impairment, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Returns true if the track is intended for people with hearing impairment, false otherwise. Valid only for #TYPE_AUDIO and #TYPE_SUBTITLE tracks.

For example of broadcast, hard of hearing information may be referred to broadcast standard (e.g. ISO 639 Language Descriptor of ISO/IEC 13818-1, Supplementary Audio Language Descriptor, AC-3 Descriptor, Enhanced AC-3 Descriptor, AAC Descriptor of ETSI EN 300 468).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSpokenSubtitle As Boolean
public: property bool IsSpokenSubtitle { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns true if the track is a spoken subtitle for people with visual impairment, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Returns true if the track is a spoken subtitle for people with visual impairment, false otherwise. Valid only for #TYPE_AUDIO tracks.
For example of broadcast, spoken subtitle information may be referred to broadcast standard (e.g. Supplementary Audio Language Descriptor of ETSI EN 300 468).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public: property System::String ^ Language { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the language information encoded by either ISO 639-1 or ISO 639-2/T.

Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As TvTrackInfoType
public: property Android::Media::TV::TvTrackInfoType Type { Android::Media::TV::TvTrackInfoType get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the type of the track.

remarks.para: Returns the type of the track. The type should be one of the followings: #TYPE_AUDIO, #TYPE_VIDEO and #TYPE_SUBTITLE.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VideoActiveFormatDescription As SByte
public: property System::SByte VideoActiveFormatDescription { System::SByte get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the Active Format Description (AFD) code of the video.

remarks.para: Returns the Active Format Description (AFD) code of the video. Valid only for #TYPE_VIDEO tracks.
The complete list of values are defined in ETSI TS 101 154 V1.7.1 Annex B, ATSC A/53 Part 4 and SMPTE 2016-1-2007.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VideoFrameRate As Single
public: property float VideoFrameRate { float get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the frame rate of the video, in the unit of fps (frames per second).

remarks.para: Returns the frame rate of the video, in the unit of fps (frames per second). Valid only for #TYPE_VIDEO tracks.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VideoHeight As Integer
public: property int VideoHeight { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the height of the video, in the unit of pixels.

remarks.para: Returns the height of the video, in the unit of pixels. Valid only for #TYPE_VIDEO tracks.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VideoPixelAspectRatio As Single
public: property float VideoPixelAspectRatio { float get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the pixel aspect ratio (the ratio of a pixel's width to its height) of the video.

remarks.para: Returns the pixel aspect ratio (the ratio of a pixel's width to its height) of the video. Valid only for #TYPE_VIDEO tracks.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VideoWidth As Integer
public: property int VideoWidth { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the width of the video, in the unit of pixels.

remarks.para: Returns the width of the video, in the unit of pixels. Valid only for #TYPE_VIDEO tracks.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
